<div class="cv-pdf-wrapper" id="cv-pdf-wrapper" style="display:none;">

</div>

<script>
function toggleResume() {
  const wrapper = document.getElementById('cv-pdf-wrapper');
  const btn = document.getElementById('cv-toggle-btn');
  const iframe = document.getElementById('cv-pdf-viewer');
  const isHidden = wrapper.style.display === 'none';
  if (isHidden) {
    if (!iframe.src || iframe.src === 'about:blank') {
      iframe.src = 'CVShrikrishnaBhat/CVShrikrishnaBhat.pdf#toolbar=0&navpanes=0';
    }
    wrapper.style.display = 'block';
    btn.innerHTML = '<i class="bi bi-eye-slash"></i> Hide Resume';
    btn.classList.add('cv-btn-active');
    wrapper.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
  } else {
    wrapper.style.display = 'none';
    btn.innerHTML = '<i class="bi bi-eye"></i> View Resume';
    btn.classList.remove('cv-btn-active');
  }
}
</script>
